Just that it either doesn't get assigned an IP address by the DHCP server or if it is assigned(rarely), it still keeps dropping packets and all and hence I am not even able to ping any website

I am having problems accessing wireless with my laptop. Everything is fine. The card is detected. Even the access point and hte network is detected. Just that it either doesn't get assigned an IP address by the DHCP server or if it is assigned(rarely), it still keeps dropping packets and all and hence I am not even able to ping any website
is it a usb wifi card or what?
Oh yes after doing lsusb, it detects the card as the one from BroadCom corporation
my only suggestion is to set the rate to 11M
The only problem is that it doesn't get assigned a DHCP Address
